name: Duck Co.
description:
Blast your way through wooden enemies as you try to get to the Duck Co. CEO, use breadcrumbs to buy stronger weapons as you progress.

No one has ever seen their face, nor does anyone know where the money comes from or what the company truly does, does the CEO even exist? All anyone can tell you is that something isn't right and that the CEO is crazy rich. You receive a call to take him down, so guns away, but something is immediately wrong...

- Setup -

1. Download the .zip file

2. Move the file into a new folder

3. Right-click the .zip file and click extract here

4. To run the game, click on the .exe file

Quick reminder, the quit button is on the opening page

- Controls - 

Esc to pause

R to quickly restart

WASD or Arrow Keys

S or Down Arrow to Duck/Slide

Click to shoot

Mouse aims

Surrey Game Jam 2022
